metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35501 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the Linux kernels implementation of audit rules, where a syscall can unexpectedly not be correctly not be logged by the audit subsystem

notes.Note: sbeattie> the commits listed in the github issue are false hits due to the string '#9' showing up in kernel oops backtraces. unfixed as of 2022-01-27

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
